prompt: Design a cozy onboarding screen with a warm brown background (Colors.brown[200]). Feature a circular illustration at the top (using a Container with a circular shape) occupying 25% of the screen height, filled with a soft beige (Colors.brown[50]). Place a brown icon (Icons.home, size 80) in the center. Below, add a bold heading in dark brown (Colors.brown[800], font size 26px, FontWeight.w700) with the text 'Feel at Home'. Include a subtitle in light brown (Colors.brown[400], font size 16px) describing the app’s comforting features. At the bottom, include a brown 'Begin' button (Colors.brown[600], 12px radius) and a 'Skip' text button in beige. Use 24px padding, center-align text, and add 16px spacing for a warm, inviting feel.
